name: vscode-task-view
description: Organize and manage VS Code tasks by source/provider in the activity bar

taskView.showTooltips.description: Enable or disable all tooltips in the Task View panel. When disabled, no hover tooltips will appear for tasks, groups, or subgroups.

taskView.showGroupTooltips.description: Show detailed information tooltips when hovering over task groups. Displays group metadata like task count, types, and task names. Only applies when 'Show Tooltips' is enabled.

taskView.showSubgroupTooltips.description: Show detailed information tooltips when hovering over task subgroups. Displays subgroup metadata like parent source, task count, and task names. Only applies when 'Show Tooltips' is enabled.

taskView.requireGroupConfirmation.description: Show a confirmation dialog before executing all tasks in a workspace group (e.g., 'build', 'test'). Helps prevent accidentally running multiple tasks. Hold Shift while clicking to bypass this confirmation.

taskView.requireSubgroupConfirmation.description: Show a confirmation dialog before executing all tasks in a subgroup or source group (e.g., npm tasks, gulp tasks). Helps prevent accidentally running multiple tasks from the same provider. Hold Shift while clicking to bypass this confirmation.

taskView.showTaskCounts.description: Display the number of tasks in parentheses next to group and subgroup names (e.g., 'build (3)'). When disabled, only single-task groups will hide their count to reduce visual clutter.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
